commits.subject: Merge pull request #77 from devmade-ai/claude/continue-implementation-plan-hnuTp
commits.body: Add Print/PDF export to comparison view

commits.subject: Add Print/PDF export to comparison view
commits.body:
Add browser-native print functionality for PDF export:
- Print button in comparison view toolbar
- Print-friendly CSS styles (@media print)
- A4 landscape page layout optimized for tables
- Best/worst value highlighting preserved in print
- Hidden UI elements (close, toolbar buttons) in print output

Update documentation:
- IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md with session notes
- BUSINESS_GUIDE.md with PDF export instructions
- UI_UX_GUIDE.md with Print/PDF in changelog

commits.subject: Merge pull request #76 from devmade-ai/claude/continue-implementation-plan-XQHLn
commits.body: Add comparison compatibility warnings and update implementation plan

commits.subject: Add Clear All button to results save actions bar
commits.body:
- Add clearAllComparisons import from app-state.js
- Add Clear All button (red styling, hidden by default)
- Show button only when saved options exist
- Add handleClearAllOptions() with browser confirm dialog
- Update implementation plan with session notes

commits.subject: Add comparison compatibility warnings and update implementation plan
commits.body:
- Add checkComparisonCompatibility() function to detect incompatible comparisons
- Display warnings when comparing different models, perspectives, or missing data
- Add CSS styles for warning banners (warning/info/error severity levels)
- Update implementation plan with session notes

commits.subject: Merge pull request #75 from devmade-ai/claude/continue-implementation-plan-2ANsi
commits.body: Update documentation for Options Overview and Compare Mode features

commits.subject: Add consolidated Future Work section to implementation plan
commits.body:
- Organize optional enhancements by category (Visual Polish, Features, Robustness, Testing)
- Include priority and effort estimates for each item
- Add notes explaining purpose of each enhancement
- Provide guidance on how to use the list in future sessions

commits.subject: Update documentation for Options Overview and Compare Mode features
commits.body:
- BUSINESS_GUIDE.md: Add complete sections for Options Overview and Compare Mode
  - Document model cards, quick comparison table, and view mode toggle
  - Document saving options, managing saved options, comparing options
  - Document export/import functionality and storage limits
  - Update FAQ to reflect new export capabilities

- UI_UX_GUIDE.md: Add UI documentation with ASCII diagrams
  - Options Overview section with layout and responsive design
  - Compare Mode section with save modal, manager panel, and comparison view
  - Update Future Enhancements (remove implemented features)
  - Add Version 2.5 changelog entry

- README.md: Add new features to Key Features list

- IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md: Add session notes documenting progress
  - Mark all three implementation phases as complete
  - Document remaining optional enhancements

commits.subject: Merge pull request #74 from devmade-ai/claude/continue-implementation-plan-itno5
commits.body: Implement Phase 3.3: Comparison Manager & View Components

commits.subject: Implement Phase 3.3: Comparison Manager & View Components
commits.body:
Add the core UI components for Compare Mode:

- comparison-manager.js: Full panel for managing saved options
  - List, load, delete, rename saved comparisons
  - Edit notes for each comparison
  - Select options for side-by-side comparison
  - Export to JSON/CSV, import from JSON
  - Clear all with confirmation dialog
  - Storage info display

- comparison-view.js: Side-by-side comparison table
  - Compare 2-4 options simultaneously
  - Developer, Buyer, Combined metrics sections
  - Transfer pricing risk display
  - Difference column with directional arrows
  - Best/worst value highlighting
  - Export comparison as JSON/CSV

- calculator.js: Integration updates
  - Import and initialize comparison components
  - Wire up "View Saved" and "Compare" buttons
  - Add cleanup for comparison modules

This substantially completes Phase 3 (Compare Mode) of the
implementation plan.

commits.subject: Merge pull request #73 from devmade-ai/claude/continue-implementation-plan-OB1Hj
commits.body: Implement Phase 3 Compare Mode - State & Storage Foundation

commits.subject: Implement Phase 3 Compare Mode - State & Storage Foundation
commits.body:
Add core infrastructure for the Compare Mode feature:

- Create utils/storage.js with localStorage persistence for saved comparisons
  - Version-tracked storage format with 20 comparison limit
  - Export (JSON/CSV) and import functionality
  - Comparison summary generation for side-by-side view

- Extend state/app-state.js with comparison management
  - savedComparisons array in state
  - Action creators: save, load, delete, update, clear comparisons
  - UI state for comparison view and modal

- Add Save as Option UI in calculator.js
  - Save Actions Bar with Save/View/Compare buttons
  - Save Modal with name and notes input
  - Auto-generated default names from model/variant
  - Reactive UI updates on comparison changes

This completes Sub-phases 3.1 (State & Storage) and 3.2 (Save UI).
Next: comparison-manager.js and comparison-view.js components.

commits.subject: Merge pull request #72 from devmade-ai/claude/continue-implementation-plan-SsD6F
commits.body: Implement Phase 2: Options Overview - Core Foundation

commits.subject: Complete Phase 2: Add localStorage persistence for view mode
commits.body:
Add user preference persistence so the selected model selection mode
(Overview/Wizard/Direct) is remembered across sessions.

Changes:
- Add loadSelectionModePreference() to load from localStorage
- Add saveSelectionModePreference() to persist preference
- Initialize selectionMode from localStorage (defaults to 'overview')
- Save preference when mode changes via toggle buttons or navigation

localStorage key: 'model-pear-selection-mode'
Valid values: overview, wizard, direct

Phase 2 (Options Overview) is now complete.

commits.subject: Implement Phase 2: Options Overview - Core Foundation
commits.body:
Add new Options Overview landing view that shows all 6 transaction models
at a glance, addressing the gap where users had to pick a model before
seeing alternatives.

New features:
- Model cards grid with icon, summary, key features, best-for tags
- Quick comparison table for side-by-side model analysis
- "Explore" buttons to dive into specific models
- "Use the guided wizard" link for recommendation-based selection
- Three-way toggle: Overview / Wizard / Direct selection modes
- Overview is now the default landing view

Technical changes:
- Enhanced getModelMetadata() with rich overview data
- Added getModelComparisonData() for comparison table
- New options-overview.js component with responsive CSS grid
- Updated calculator.js with Overview mode integration

commits.subject: Merge pull request #71 from devmade-ai/claude/start-implementation-plan-vcGt2
commits.body: Implement Phase 1: Perspective Toggle Enhancement

commits.subject: Implement Phase 1: Perspective Toggle Enhancement
commits.body:
This commit implements Phase 1 of the IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN, enhancing
the perspective toggle and party relationship selection experience.

New Features:
- Party Relationship Selector (party-selector.js): Prominent radio cards
  for selecting between "Independent Parties" (2 perspectives) and
  "Related Parties" (3 perspectives with Shareholder view)
- Enhanced Perspective Toggle: Dynamic labels that change based on
  relationship type - "Net Effect" becomes "Shareholder" when Related
- Keyboard shortcuts: D (Developer), B (Buyer), S (Shareholder/Net Effect),
  M (toggle Mutual Ownership)

Changes:
- Created ui/intercompany/party-selector.js
- Added setRelationshipType() and arePartiesRelated() to app-state.js
- Integrated party selector into calculator.js
- Removed "Relationship Settings" from entity-config.js (moved to party selector)
- Enhanced perspective-toggle.js with dynamic display and keyboard shortcuts
- Updated IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md with completed tasks and session notes
- Updated UI_UX_GUIDE.md with new keyboard shortcuts and changelog

Phase 1 Status: COMPLETE
Next: Phase 2 (Options Overview) or user testing

commits.subject: Add implementation plan for aligning tool with usage scenarios
commits.body:
Comprehensive plan covering three priorities:
- Compare Mode: Save and compare options side-by-side
- Options Overview: See all 6 models at a glance
- Perspective Toggle: Make related/unrelated prominent

Includes detailed task lists, UI mockups, state management
extensions, and phased implementation order.
